value.description: Wrack the target with pain for a short time. Affected constructs lose mental coherence instead.\n\n Multiple casts on the same target do not stack.
Magically-induced pain.
Magically-induced pain. On constructs, this instead weakens their mental essence.

Wrap the target in an anti-magic shell, lowering its magical sensitivity by an amount equal to half the caster's. If the target was already affected by Stifle, the stronger instance will take effect with its duration refreshed.
An anti-magic shell dampens this character's magic sensitivity.

Geomantically excavate a pocket underneath the target patch of ground, rendering it unstable. This acts like a trap, stunning whoever triggers it. Larger creatures are less affected.\n\nCannot be placed adjacent to other traps. Each sinkhole will naturally collapse on its own after 5 days.
Mystically guide the target's movement, increasing their moving capacity and immunizing them to slowdown caused by different terrain types.
Magically-induced optimization of movement, increasing movement capacities and nullifying terrain pathing costs.

Transfer half of the first target's restfulness or golem-animating energy to the second target. Less effective if the first target has reduced magic sensitivity. The recipient will gain more energy if the donor is larger than it, or less if the donor is smaller.

value.li: r_logentry->[INITIATOR_nameDef] relayed a vision of future harm to [RECIPIENT_nameDef].

value.description: Erect a healing ward at the target point. The local spirits will not only aid those within in recovering from injury and disease, they will also clean away filth.
The healing influence of a carezone ward.
A state of paralysis brought about by the Paralysis Link spell.

Manifests a copy of the targeted resource item from pure aether.\n\nItems worth more than 350 silver can't be replicated. If the target is an item stack exceeding 500 silver in value, the manifestation will be smaller in order to be at or under 500 silver in value.
Transfer a quarter of the caster's magical sensitivity to the target. If the target was already affected by Sensitize, the stronger instance will take effect with its duration refreshed.
Enhanced magical sensitivity lent by a spellcaster.
By casting the Sensitize spell, this character has temporarily lost some magical sensitivity.

Generate a quiescent portal at the target's current location. Once its duration expires, the target leaves the current map, or the caster wills it, the target is immediately returned through the portal, causing it to close.
A link to a dormant portal. After 1 day has elapsed - or when the spellcaster who created the portal wills it - this character will be sent back through the portal, causing it to vanish.

Recite litany from the arcane mysteries to lull the target into a trancelike state. While in this state, the target will meditate and rest more effectively, but will feel disconnected from their body, reducing consciousness.
A magically-induced state of enhanced metaphysical connectivity. This improves the efficacy of meditation and rest, but draws the soul away from the physical body, reducing consciousness.

value.li: r_logentry->[INITIATOR_nameDef] recited a litany of arcane words which lulled [RECIPIENT_nameDef] into a trancelike, mana-receptive state.

value.description: Call down a flickering tendril of elemental lightning to strike the target point. Unlike natural lightning, this directed attack is capable of slightly injuring constructs.

Envelop the target in a mystic ward. This ward can absorb up to 60 damage, but it only blocks explosions and projectiles, and lightning disruptions can dispel it instantly. Unlike certain other kinds of wards, it does not regenerate.

A projectile-repelling ward generated by skipgates. It will attempt to stop incoming projectiles or shrapnel, but does nothing against melee attacks or heat. It breaks apart instantly if hit by lightning disruptions, and it does not regenerate.\n\nThis ward takes damage after any wards generated by equipment. Since it is nearly skintight, it is possible to fire ranged weapons through it.
Enrage the spirits of the earth underneath the target point, causing periodic upheaval around it. This repeatedly staggers anyone nearby (unless they are floating), and also stuns emplaced weapons.

Shunts all nearby items into a vault demiplane. The caster may later retrieve all items from the vault at once. Every 10 objects (or stacks of objects) stored in this way consume 1% mana per day.\n\nIf the caster dies with items stored in the vault, the vault’s contents will be returned to the caster’s location, but roughly one-third of the items may be lost.
Can store a large amount of items, though every 10 items drains 1% mana per day. Click the provided button to unload all of them at once.

Maintain an astral connection to the target which hones its mind, boosting moving and manipulation capacities. This process incurs arcane load over time, and it will stop if the target moves more than 60 cells away, the target is downed for more than 4 seconds, or the caster is rendered incapable of spellcasting.\n\nCosts 2.5 arcane load per second.
An astrally-induced mental boost to movement and manipulation capacities. Scales with magical sensitivity.
Beckon the winds to blow random gliders to the targeted location. Each usually contains a small amount of resources or leaves behind metal slag, with a slight chance for a small animal instead.
A brief state of disorientation brought on by an unexpectedly bumpy glider landing.

Briefly swell with mystic power. The next spell cast within 2 hours will not incur arcane load and will have 80% of its mana cost refunded; if it is a teleportation spell, its range will also be extended.
A temporarily enhanced connection to the flows of magic. Makes the next spell cheaper (and, if it is a teleportation spell, longer-ranged).

Teleport a random item carried or worn by the target into the caster's possession, slightly damaging it. If the target is hostile, this will preferentially steal their weapon, then their apparel, then things in their inventory; otherwise, the priority of items to steal is reversed. Stealing worn apparel, wielded weapons, or from a member of a highly advanced faction will worsen relations with the target's faction.\n\nAlso raises the target's alert level by 5, making it more difficult to pickpocket them.
Conjure an elaborate clockwork contraption which fires projectiles at nearby enemies. It will vanish after 1 hour - unless it is about to explode.

Suffuse the area around the target point with the elements of cold, fire, and lightning. Lightning stuns golems and other animate constructs; fire and cold cause heatstroke, hypothermia, and possibly burns.
A suffusion of elemental essences can cause simultaneous freezing and burning.

Teleport the target chunk far into the sky and then send it crashing down on the target point with magically-enhanced force. Chunks made of more durable materials will cause more damage.\n\nShields that block catapult fire also block chunks "fired" by this spell.
Cause a portion of the target's body to simply vanish. Deals quadruple damage to buildings, and ignores any level of incoming damage factor other than total invulnerability.

Generate a small ball of celestial sunlight. It will hover in place, providing enough light to work by and grow plants in, as well as suppressing nearby fires and adjusting the local temperature to that of a lukewarm day.

Incant while close to the target to form a protective ward around it. This ward reduces incoming damage, slows bleeding, and improves resistance to toxins and disease. Additionally, when the target is next downed, the ward will enter a brief state of increased potency, and it will also teleport the target to a nearby unoccupied bed if possible.

A ward which reinforces bodily integrity. When downed, this effect will temporarily double, and this character will teleport to the nearest bed appropriate to their level of freedom (free, prisoner, or slave), prioritizing medical beds.
A fully activated Word of Safety ward. It has enhanced protective potency but will burn out soon.

value.li: r_logentry->[INITIATOR_nameDef] uttered a powerful abjurative spell which manifested a protective ward around [RECIPIENT_nameDef].

value.description: Speak to the target, invoking the spirits of wellness. The target will be cured of one overdose, disease, toxic effect, or non-luciferium addiction. However, it will also strain the target's body, causing a coma for three days and lingering discomfort for three days after that.

value.li: r_logentry->[INITIATOR_nameDef] spoke a greater word of healing, curing [RECIPIENT_nameDef] of an adverse health condition.

value.description: Banish the target somewhere far, far away, removing it from the sphere of immediate concern.\n\nUnlike other conjuration spells, weight, size, and lack of magical sensitivity do not affect whether an object is targetable.

Pluck the strands of fate to cause one or more positive events to occur within the next 2-24 hours. The more magic sensitivity the caster has, the more good events will happen. After casting, the caster will fall into a 2-day coma.

Beckon to the dark powers of the earth, causing an infestation to surface around the target point. The more magic sensitivity the caster has, the more insectoids will respond to the call.\n\nNo insectoids will surface if the target region is too cold, or if there are already more than 150 hives on the map.

Envelops the target in potent healing magic. It gradually heals wounds, removes scars, and even regrows lost body parts, but it decreases in potency each day. It also leaves the target perpetually exhausted, hungry, sluggish, and pained. The effect ends prematurely if the target takes any damage. It also greatly increases the risk of developing cancer for the next year.
A potent but gradual healing magic. It will be lost if the patient takes any damage. Inevitable imperfections in the spell's arcane matrix cause it to also increase the risk of developing cancer.
Create a profane astral disturbance that ripples throughout the target region, dimming the senses and minds of anyone inside.

Speak about becoming one with another while extracting mental essence from the listener to place it into a coma. The other target gains some of that mental essence, boosting its consciousness, though if the coma should ever be undone that essence will return to the listener. The benefit of this ability can stack up to ten times.\n\nThe listener must be conscious, but can be downed. The souls of children have a quality that renders them immune to this magic.

Due to being spiritually melded to another being, this character is in a persistent vegetative state. Most of its mental essence has been co-opted to boost the consciousness of the being it is melded to.
The mental essences of other entities are being used to boost the consciousness of this character.
Uses potent healing reagents to recall the mental essences which were excised by the Word of Melding spell, ending the coma with no ill effects for the patient.

value.li: r_logentry->[INITIATOR_nameDef] spiritually melded [RECIPIENT_nameDef] into the mind of another.

value.description: Transfer up to 50% mana from one spellcaster to any spellcaster other than oneself. The donor's loss is instant, while the recipient gains the mana over a brief period.\n\nMultiple casts on the same recipient increase the amount of mana the recipient will gain, but not the rate.
Mana transferred from another spellcaster.
Summon daring warriors from the heavens to the targeted location. They take orders from the caster, but will disappear after 6 hours or when downed. They may be slain without consequence.
Speak exaltant words of benediction, endowing a permanent buff of the target's choice upon it. No creature may have more than one blessing at a time; choosing a new one replaces the previous one.

Weave a malicious hex that affects everyone around the target point. They become stunned on taking damage, and they are easier to suppress and stagger, less likely to dodge or parry, and less able to avoid traps.
Death-craving spirits wish the demise of this creature. It is stunned on taking damage.

Channel the winds' fury to create a tornado at the target point. The tornado lasts for at least three hours, or indefinitely longer if the caster can maintain focus and remain within 70 cells. While the link is maintained, the tornado remains in place and can be directed to a new location by subsequent recasts; otherwise, it wanders like a natural tornado.\n\nCosts 4 arcane load per second.
Weave a malicious hex that affects everyone around the target point, maximizing attack accuracy against them.
Attacks against this creature have maximized accuracy, guided along by death-craving spirits.

Channel the winds to create a tornado at the target point. The tornado lasts for at least three hours, or indefinitely longer if the caster can maintain focus and remain within 60 cells. While the link is maintained, the tornado remains in place and can be directed to a new location by subsequent recasts; otherwise, it wanders like a natural tornado.\n\nCosts 5 arcane load per second.

Maintain an astral connection to the target which will, after a certain point, cause the target to become paralyzed. This process incurs arcane load over time, and it will stop if the target moves more than 35 cells away or the caster is rendered incapable of spellcasting.

Targets with more hit points or lower magical sensitivity take longer to paralyze.

Costs 1 arcane load per second.

Rapidly gain mana by siphoning it from the target spellcaster. This effect will end prematurely if the target runs out of mana, or if the target moves more than 35 cells away.\n\nUnwilling targets can also end the effect after a short delay, stunning the caster, the target, and anyone else the caster has attached a manaleech link to.
Astral emanations from a nearby spellcaster will induce paralysis. Taking out the spellcaster or moving further than 35 cells away will terminate the buildup before it can take effect.
Mana is being transferred out of this character to another spellcaster. Moving further than 35 cells away will end this effect.

Maintain an astral connection to the target which will, after a certain point, cause the target to become paralyzed. This process incurs arcane load over time, and it will stop if the target moves more than 30 cells away or the caster is rendered incapable of spellcasting.

Targets with more hit points or lower magical sensitivity take longer to paralyze.

Costs 1 arcane load per second.

Rapidly gain mana by siphoning it from the target spellcaster. This effect will end prematurely if the target runs out of mana, or if the target moves more than 30 cells away.\n\nUnwilling targets can also end the effect after a short delay, stunning the caster, the target, and anyone else the caster has attached a manaleech link to.
Astral emanations from a nearby spellcaster will induce paralysis. Taking out the spellcaster or moving further than 30 cells away will terminate the buildup before it can take effect.
Mana is being transferred out of this character to another spellcaster. Moving further than 30 cells away will end this effect.

Bathe the target in psychic frequencies which will, after a certain point, suffuse the target's body and induce paralysis. This process incurs neural heat over time, and it will stop if the target moves more than 35 cells away or the caster is rendered incapable of psycasting.

Targets with more hit points or lower psychic sensitivity take longer to paralyze.

Costs 1 neural heat per second.

Rapidly gain psyfocus by siphoning it from the target psycaster. This effect will end prematurely if the target runs out of psyfocus, or if the target moves more than 35 cells away.\n\nUnwilling targets can also end the effect after a short delay, stunning the caster, the target, and anyone else the caster has attached a psyphon link to.
Psychic emanations from a nearby psycaster will induce paralysis. Taking out the psycaster or moving more than 35 cells away will terminate the buildup before it can take effect.
Psyfocus is being transferred out of this character to another psycaster. Moving further than 35 cells away will end this effect.

Render everyone around the target point incompetent at combat. They become stunned on taking damage, and they are easier to suppress and stagger, less likely to dodge or parry, and less able to avoid traps.
This creature has been psychically rendered incompetent at combat. It will be stunned on taking damage.

Use an alterable sequence of microscopic skipgates in the atmosphere to create a tornado at the target point. The tornado lasts for at least three hours, or indefinitely longer if the caster can maintain focus and remain within 70 cells. While the link is maintained, the tornado remains in place and can be directed to a new location by subsequent recasts; otherwise, it wanders like a natural tornado.\n\nCosts 4 neural heat per second.
